document_data.name: ''Talisman of the Beast''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Talismans of the beast''''' were rare [[enchanted]] [[talisman]]s that allowed the wearer to communicate with animals at will.
document_data.Description: These items had multi-colored beads strung on papyrus reeds that revealed images of animals when spun.
document_data.Powers: In addition to being able to speak with animals at will, the wearer of a ''talisman of the beast'' could transform into a natural beast up to three times per day. The wearer would first need to revert to their normal form if they desired to change into a different animal.
document_data.History: These items were first created and used by the various beast cults prevalent in [[Unther]] and [[Mulhorand]] around {{Yearlink|1}}. Only two of these items were known to exist.
